'''Mr. Adelman''' was the widower whose wife passed away on [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]]'s massage table in "[[The One With The Lesbian Wedding]]". He was portrayed by [[Phil Leeds]].

After the death of [[Mrs Adelman]], Phoebe felt that the spirit of her client had entered in her. She met with Mr. Adelman in [[Central Perk]] to ask if Mrs Adelman had some unfinished business so that Phoebe would complete it. Mr. Adelman said that his wife used to say that she wanted to "see everything" before she died.

Mr Adelman had a sense of humor, he added that his wife wanted to have sex with him one last time. To that Phoebe replied that there was laughing in her head. Mr. Adelman then turned to Joey and said "Worth a shot, huh?" the statement with which could Joey only agree.
